name: Abubakr Hassan Alfaki Mohammed
skills_sentences: Azure DevOps and Jira ticketing tools
Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines
Incident management and multi-level application support
responsibility_sentences: Collaborated with back-end teams to synchronize data flow and deliver seamless functionality
Conducted post-incident reviews to identify root causes and implement preventive measures
Created responsive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript ensuring cross-browser compatibility
Designed and integrated RESTful APIs to enhance application functionality and connectivity
Developed full-stack web applications using ASP.NET Core and React.js ensuring scalability and responsiveness
Managed and resolved P1, P2, and P3 tickets using Jira and Azure DevOps adhering to service level agreements
Managed database and query optimization to improve application stability and performance
Monitored production systems proactively to identify and prevent service disruptions
Optimized SQL Server database queries to improve application performance
Provided L1, L2, and L3 support for production applications minimizing downtime
